Question: Which statements are true regarding the soundtrack album of *Thugs of Hindostan*?
Options:
A. a) The soundtrack album was released on 31st October 2018.
B. b) The album is composed by Ajay-Atul.
C. c) The soundtrack is available in Hindi, Tamil, and Telugu.
D. d) The total duration of the soundtrack album is 20 minutes.
Answer: a) The soundtrack album was released on 31st October 2018., b) The album is composed by Ajay-Atul., c) The soundtrack is available in Hindi, Tamil, and Telugu.

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the music of *Thugs of Hindostan*?
Options:
A. a) Ajay-Atul composed the music for *Thugs of Hindostan*.
B. b) The soundtrack album for *Thugs of Hindostan* was released on 31st October 2018.
C. c) Ajay-Atul produced the soundtrack album under their label YRF MusicDivo.
D. d) The music for *Thugs of Hindostan* was composed by A.R. Rahman.
Answer: a) Ajay-Atul composed the music for *Thugs of Hindostan*., b) The soundtrack album for *Thugs of Hindostan* was released on 31st October 2018., c) Ajay-Atul produced the soundtrack album under their label YRF MusicDivo.

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the soundtrack album of 'Thugs of Hindostan'?
Options:
A. a) The soundtrack album was released on 31st October 2018.
B. b) The album is available in three languages: Hindi, Tamil, and Telugu.
C. c) The soundtrack has a total duration of 15:36.
D. d) The album was composed by A.R. Rahman.
Answer: a) The soundtrack album was released on 31st October 2018., b) The album is available in three languages: Hindi, Tamil, and Telugu., c) The soundtrack has a total duration of 15:36.
